name: Machine Evolution Gameplay Demo
description:
Machine Evolution challenges the player with fast paced third person combat. The player has access to multiple magical abilities, and boostpads around the map. Different enemy types will attack the player with waves of projectiles and melee attacks. The player must get comfortable with their varying aerial abilities to defeat the machines. During gameplay different pickups, like health or speedboosts, will spawn to help the player.

I made this game for an application to a game design college. If you want to help me out some more, please fill out this short 10 question form: https://form.jotform.com/220396116278054
